name: Golf Ball Retriever with Storage Bag, Detachable Golf Ball Picker Upper Tube, Aluminum Alloy Golf Ball Collector, 40 Inch Golf Balls Shagger Grabber for Men Women, Hold up to 24 Golf Balls
short_description: 【High-Quality】The 39.8 inch golf ball retriever is composed of special aluminum alloy, which is high strength, not deformed and corrosion resistant. The top lid is made of TPR and can be opened for pouring the balls quickly.

【Not Bending Over】This golf pick-up tool adopts durable four claw design, which can catch the ball easily, quickly and accurately, grasp accurately and not fall easily. With the ball pick-up, golfers can retrieve their ball while standing upright. Provides many conveniences in playing golf ball, effortless and saving time.

【High Capacity & Removable】Golf balls shag tube holds up to 24 golf balls, making it easy to retrieve them in a short time. The pipe is long enough to pick up the ball without bending. It can be easily disassembled into three sections and fit in a golf club bag.

【Golf Ball Retriever Tube with Storage Bag】Come with a storage bag, the disassembled golf ball retriever and golf balls can be easily stored in the bag. You can pick up the golf ball anywhere. This is your ball shagger of choice when practicing in the backyard or hitting into a cage net.

【Exceptional After-Sales Support】Please do not hesitate to reach out to us if you are dissatisfied with our golf ball retriever or if you encounter any issues. We are committed to providing you with options such as replacements, refunds, or other appropriate solutions. Our primary objective is to ensure your satisfaction!
